title: Mystery Jet Packer, What’s A Red Mirage? 9.3.20
itunes:title: Mystery Jet Packer, What’s A Red Mirage? 9.3.20
description:
In episode 708, Jack and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by American Hysteria podcast host Chelsey Weber-Smith to discuss the red mirage scenario in relation to the 2020 election, DHS withholding intelligence about a Russian attack on Biden, the killing of Dijon Kizzee by the LA County Sheriff, the poisoning of a Putin opponent, a jetpack sighting at LAX, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Exclusive: Dem group warns of apparent Trump Election Day landslide
  2. DHS withheld July intelligence bulletin calling out Russian attack on Biden’s mental health
  3. Fatal shooting of Black man by L.A. County sheriff’s deputies sparks protests and questions
  4. #DijonKizzee , a 29yo Black man, was fatally shot by @LASDHQ deputies. Cops stopped him while riding his bike for alleged “vehicle code violation.” They say he ran, dropped clothes and handgun. He didn't pick it up, but cops shot him in the back 20+ times then left him for hours.
  5. Poisoning of Putin opponent renews spotlight on deadly Russian chemical weapon
  6. Feds investigate pilot’s sighting of ‘a guy in a jet pack’ flying at 3,000 feet near LAX
  7. Jetpack Sighting at 3,000 Feet Over Los Angeles Prompts Investigation
  8. WATCH: Chronixx - Dela Move (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
